issue.title: Segmentation fault in gzclient with camera visualization enabled

content.raw:
I think this may be related to the fact that `CameraVisual`'s aren't using proper unique names when calling `this->camera->CreateRenderTexture()`. At least I have been able to trace back (and solve) segfaults by adding this scoping - otherwise if two or more cameras were deleted they would segfault purely because it would tell OGRE to delete the same render texture twice.

Here's a commit in which I made several changes to get rid of segmentation faults I had relating to `CameraSensor`'s (which add a camera):
https://bitbucket.org/ElteHupkes/gazebo/commits/46a7aa1bffe153cb407a742603b052a37c61642a
